title: A different interpretation of seeing mice

preview.html: We present to you a different interpretation of seeing mice. Many people consider it in a dream a confusing and mysterious vision. Some also see it as a promising vision, while others see it as a bad omen and an unpleasant interpretation. Through In the following lines in the encyclopedia, we will refer to the interpretation of different visions of mice in a dream and how interpretation scholars interpreted them. Each according to the same dream and the social and psychological state of its owner. A different interpretation of seeing mice. Ibn Sirin believes that the female mouse appears as a bad and hateful woman and is characterized by malice, promising that whoever sees the male mouse being kind, it symbolizes the abundance of food and money, and if the mouse leaves the house of the owner of the mouse. The dream indicates a lack of blessing and food. As for killing a mouse, Ibn Sirin believes that it is one of the praiseworthy visions, as this indicates victory over an enemy or getting rid of the corrupt that harbors evil in the vision. Catching a mouse has another interpretation, as he believes that it indicates that the dreamer will meet an evil woman who seeks to harm him. However, if someone dreams of throwing another mouse at him, this indicates that the latter hates him and wants evil. One of the praiseworthy interpretations of seeing mice is seeing them chasing them, which indicates that the dreamer will enjoy a life of blessings. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of seeing mice in a dream. Al-Nabulsi said that entertaining a mouse in a dream It indicates an increase in his livelihood, and seeing him go and then return indicates a long life, while a mouse digging somewhere indicates the presence of a thief. Al-Nabulsi believes that the large number of mice in a dream indicates a large number of offspring in the house and that the mouse comes out of his nose, so he warns the dreamer of the harm that may befall him. His son. Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of seeing mice in a dream. Ibn Shaheen said that seeing a mouse in a dream is an ugly woman in appearance and essence, and killing her in a dream indicates a separation between the dreamer and that woman. As for catching it, it is a sign that he will marry a deceitful woman, and that he will have children from a corrupt wife. Seeing mice for single people: There are many interpretations of seeing a mouse in a dream for a single girl, as this could indicate her feeling of confusion and fear, because the girl seeing mice in reality causes her panic, Seeing mice for an unmarried woman leads to solving all her problems and achieving stability in her life. Seeing mice for married women: Some people interpret seeing a married woman carrying a mouse in a dream as having the dream scold others and lacking self-confidence. Seeing a lot of mice can mean livelihood. As for the small mouse, seeing it warns of problems that may arise between the woman and her husband, and the woman who catches the mouse warns of the harm that her enemies will cause her, such as killing her, mice, indicates that the married woman gets rid of her worries and problems. Seeing a pregnant rat Seeing a mouse indicates for a pregnant woman Generally, it indicates fear and anxiety about childbirth, and killing a mouse indicates her efforts to maintain and complete her pregnancy. Seeing mice for a man. If a man dreams that he is chasing mice to kill them, this indicates his attempt to get rid of his problems. However, if a mouse bites the man in a dream, this means that he will suffer minor damage that will disappear quickly. And it becomes so. Followed by Zia

title: Interpretation of seeing a rabbit being slaughtered in a dream

preview.html: We will explain it in detail in our article today for women and men, according to the psychological and social state. Seeing a slaughtered rabbit in the dream of an unmarried woman. Scientists said that the only girl who dreams of owning a rabbit farm and takes a number of them every day and slaughters them quickly is a sign that she is making many wonderful decisions in her life. As for her dream, she is feeding Rabbits and grazing them with the intention of slaughtering them in the end, this indicates that the dreamer is thinking about ending a number of things in her life. The meaning of seeing a rabbit slaughtered in a dream for a pregnant woman. The pregnant woman who sees her wakes up killing a large rabbit and the color white in a dream to feed her unborn child is a sign of her concern for the fetus and her advancement with Preparations and buying his claims. And whoever dreams that she feeds a rabbit until she slaughters it afterwards, this is a sign of her preoccupation. He is thinking about some issues that need to be solved. The meaning of seeing a rabbit bite in a dream When a person dreams of biting a rabbit, this is a sign that he will go through a major crisis, but God Almighty will help you solve it. As for For a man who dreams of a rabbit, this is a sign of his loss of money, but it will be simple. Interpretation of seeing rabbits in a dream: Dreaming of a large number of rabbits in a dream is a sign of a broad and very good diet for the dreamer. It is a symbol of engagement to an unmarried girl. Perhaps she will achieve dreams, desires, and ambitions after her effort and diligence. It indicates Seeing many rabbits in a married woman’s bed also indicates that she will give birth to a pregnant child. As for whom do you believe? Her husband buying her rabbit in a dream symbolizes marital stability between them, understanding and love. As for a man who dreams of a group of rabbits in a dream, this is a sign that he received money through one of his relatives or friends. And whoever sees Himself buying rabbits indicates the search for a livelihood or a good job opportunity. Perhaps many rabbits in a dream mean goodness and blessings for the dreamer. Add the dream that you would like to interpret, with reference to the marital status, in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about removing damaged teeth

preview.html: Seeing a tooth falling out is a common and recurring dream, and it also carries a feeling of anxiety and tension in the eyes of the viewer. Interpretation scholars differed in interpreting the dream of removing a tooth according to the nature of the dream and the nature of the dreamer, and this will be explained below, so stay with us.Interpretation of the dream of removing damaged teethIf he sees himself removing a tooth in his sleep. It may be a sign of the dreamer’s description of a high degree of logic and stability. Also, if he sees himself removing a tooth in his sleep. A pregnant woman saw that she was removing her tooth that was bothering the doctor. This may be an indication that she may give birth by caesarean section. If a person sees in his dream that he is removing a decayed tooth and he was facing a difficult problem at that time. This may be a sign of his ability to overcome the difficult problem that he is going through. God willing. But if a person sees that he is pulling out a rotten tooth in his dream, this may be a sign that the dreamer is helping others without expecting a return. Interpretation of tooth extraction in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin explains that when a person sees in a dream that his upper molar has been removed, he will fall On his lap after the extraction. This may indicate that she will give birth to a new baby, God willing. Ibn Sirin explains that if he saw the dreamer’s tooth being extracted and falling out. This may be an indication that he may be suffering from worries, sadness and problems, and God knows best. Ibn Shirin narrated that when The teeth of a fortune teller. It could be a sign that he has paid his debts, as well as a solution to his problems that he may face in his life. Ibn Sirin explains that if he sees the contaminated tooth removed and it falls into the hands of the soothsayer after removing it in a dream. This may indicate that the soothsayer has a son in The state of his wife’s pregnancy. It also indicates that a reconciliation has been reached between the priest and the adversary in the event of a dispute between one of his relatives, and God knows best. We have chosen for you: Interpretation of a dream about tooth decay for individuals. Extracting a rotten tooth in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen explains in his interpretations that if there is a fracture in the tooth In a person’s dream. This may indicate that he will pay money to obtain purity and clarity of mind, and God knows best. Ibn Shaheen says: Whoever sees this will have his tooth extracted. It may be a sign of severing ties of kinship with relatives and family. Ibn Shaheen confirms that if someone sees that he has his tooth extracted and it falls out In his lap. This is an indication that he will obtain a lot of money, God willing. Ibn Shaheen confirmed that if a person sees his tooth being pulled out, it may be evidence of a relative’s sudden fatigue, and God knows best. When someone sees in a dream that he scratched a tooth and it fell into his lap. This may It means gathering people in his house to remove all problems and obstacles between them, God willing. When a person saw that he had his tooth removed, it fell into his arms. This may be a sign of an increase in offspring among his family. To remove a tooth in a dream for a single woman. If a single woman sees in her dream that she is extracting a tooth and it was Without pain, this vision could be evidence of her ability to get rid of all problems. When an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she had her tooth extracted, this may be evidence of the approaching date of her wedding. If an unmarried woman sees a tooth or one of her teeth falling out in her hand When she sees an unmarried woman in her dream, it may be beneficial for her

title: Interpretation of dreams to see raw, grilled or fried fish in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing raw, grilled, or fried fish in a dream, and fish in a dream is one of those visions that indicate vitality and vitality, whether raw or flat, in terms of protein. Seeing raw fish in a dream has many connotations and interpretations. A fish in a dream indicates food and kindness, and fried fish indicates good luck and a safe and stable life. Therefore, we will tell you the most important interpretation of the interpretation of a dream about seeing raw, baked, or fried fish in a dream. Follow us. Dream of seeing Fish by Ibn Sirin: Seeing fish in a dream means prosperity and wealth. As for whoever saw that he was fishing in a dream, and the size of the fish was large, the dream here is an interpretation that the sleeper will obtain a lot of money. For whoever saw a fish in a dream playing without catching it, this indicates On the disappearance of the blessing. However, if the sleeper finds that he is catching fish, but the fish is completely devoid of skin, then the sleeper is often deceiving people. Whoever dreams in a dream that he unfortunately ate a rotten fish, then the dream indicates that he will create an illicit marriage or relationship, and God knows best. Whoever sees in a dream a whale walking in the sea, then the whale here indicates that the sleeper will be imprisoned, and God knows best. A pregnant woman dreams of seeing fish. If a pregnant woman sees the fish but it was still alive in the dream, the interpretation of the dream here indicates that the dreamer will give birth to a child. Vision A fish in a dream, but its skin color is brown, is usually a sign that the dreamer will be more successful, especially in business or trade. Dream of seeing fish in bed. If one sees a fish in a dream, but it is in bed, and the fish here indicates that the sleeper will suffer from pain or illness, and God knows best. As for whoever sees fried fish in a dream, his interpretation of the dream means that the sleeper insisted on God’s specific request and that he will respond, God willing. Dream of seeing fish with relatives. Seeing him eating fish with relatives indicates success at work and progress in commercial life. Eating fish also indicates paying off debts. And freedom from worries. Eating fish with relatives in a girl’s dream also indicates her marriage. She dreams of seeing fish with rice. Seeing yourself eating fish with rice is a promising dream that indicates an abundance of food. Seeing a pregnant woman eating fish with rice means the birth of a healthy child. If you see a man He eats fish with rice in a dream, it also means that he will receive large sums of money. Dream of seeing fish with friends. Seeing yourself eating fish with friends is a good vision that indicates an improvement in social level and the removal of worries and sorrows. Aside from the friendly and loving relationship that binds those Friends together. Eating fish is also considered one of the visions that indicate the fulfillment of dreams and aspirations that the dreamer seeks to achieve in the near future. Dream of seeing raw fish in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about cleaning raw fish indicates a lot of goodness and abundance of blessings. Seeing an unmarried woman cleaning raw fish in a dream indicates that you are a girl with a pure heart, pure and righteous

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing an infant in a dream for an unmarried woman

preview.html: Seeing an infant in a dream for an unmarried woman. Some girls search for the meaning of seeing a male infant in a dream, and they may find him giving birth or carrying him in her arms and feel reassured while hugging him, but in some cases this child may be very sick or we see him crying and screaming, and thus we clarify that the meaning of the dream It changes in these cases and we highlight the most important interpretations during our article. Seeing an infant in a dream for an unmarried woman When a girl sees a child, she feels happiness and joy if he is beautiful and laughs with her, and the dream in this case translates to her marriage to an honest man and full of noble and clear qualities, which means that he is not. She hid some things from her that would cause her shock and unhappiness later. If an unmarried woman sees the birth of a small child in front of her and it is a boy with innocent and beautiful features, then the dream interprets that she is engaged to the man she desires and prays to God Almighty. more. Being close to him and making her happy with what is happening. Seeing a baby crying with indifferent features is one of the things that warns her of betrayal by her fiancé or some life problems related to the practical side and not getting the promotion she seeks. Seeing a baby in a dream for an unmarried woman according to Ibn Sirin. The meaning of seeing a baby for a girl is divided According to Ibn Sirin, it refers to two things, either happiness for him or apparent sadness, and this happens with the form of this child, which affects the interpretation, where the beautiful infant is a sign. Of repentance and marriage, even if it is not wondrous and beautiful, it shows unhappiness and worries increase, and that you suffer from pain and sadness. It may be strange for a girl in her dream to buy a young boy and a baby, and Ibn Sirin confirms that there is harm coming in her reality with this vision, while the beautiful child explains the job. New and academic success or success in it. The only special thing in her life. Why don't you find an interpretation of your dream? Go to Google and search for interpretation of dreams online. The most important interpretations of seeing a baby in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a single woman carrying a male child in a dream. Ibn Sirin believes that a girl carrying a male child in her dream is one of the signs of a successful and successful engagement, because it is for someone who is respected and loved, and this is as beautiful and calm as a young child. And exhaustion, whether at home or at work, that is, suffering from stress and lack of success. Seeing a child talking in a dream with an unmarried woman. If an unmarried woman sees an infant talking to her and telling her some matters related to her life and future, the dream interprets that there is a message carried by this little child and it confirms On the necessity of doing so, the example and words of the infant confirm the good news that proves her innocence of some of the actions that some have accused her of in the past. He suffered great sadness and injustice because of it. Seeing an unmarried woman buying a baby in a dream. If an unmarried woman buys a small baby in her dream and becomes sad while doing so, the meaning imposes on her some situations that she does not want to endure, but she is forced to. Seeing a handsome male baby In a dream for an unmarried woman, life events around the girl become wonderful and characterized by great joy

title: Interpretation of a dream about the news of the death of a living person

preview.html: To interpret this vision, we need to know the details of the dream and whether the person who died was alive or dead and what was the cause of death. Interpretation of hearing the news of the death of a living person for a single person. Whoever dreams that he heard the news of the death of a living person whom he knows in reality, the vision indicates the longevity of this person and God knows best. If this person is unknown to her, this means that she will hear good news very soon. As for the one who sees in her dream a person dying in front of her eyes, this is a sign of the dreamer's longevity. Hearing the news of the death of a married man alive A married woman who dreams of hearing the news of the death of a person she knows in reality is an indication that she is hiding a big secret that she does not want to reveal. As for her who dreams of a person she knows dying in a dream in front of her, this is a sign of the renewal of that person's life and her longevity. As for if she sees that she heard the news of the death of one of her relatives, this indicates the great love in her heart for this person and she always thinks about him and his affairs. And if she dreams of the death of a stranger in her dream, this indicates the end of the obstacles she is going through. Hearing the news of the death of a living person in a divorced woman's dream A divorced woman who dreams of hearing the news of the death of a living person in her dream announces psychological suffering Internally lives and causes her pain. It may indicate the unstable life she lives after the divorce and her suffering from society's view of her. If the news of the death of a living person is a man I already know, this is a sign of longevity and health. Hearing the news of the death of a pregnant woman live A pregnant woman who dreams of the presence of a person she does not know, and she heard the news of his death during her sleep, her skin is good. Easy birth. It also indicates her recovery from the pains of the months of pregnancy she is going through. The vision heralds the birth of a healthy man. Whoever sees that he heard the news of the death of a person he knows well, it is a sign of the wide breastfeeding of the newborn. Add the dream you want to interpret, indicating the social status in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.
preview.text: To interpret this vision, we need to know the details of the dream and whether the person who died is alive or dead and what is the cause of death. Interpretation of hearing the news of the death of a living person for one person. Whoever dreams that he heard the news of the death of a living person I know in reality, the vision indicates the long life of this person, and God I know. If this person is unknown to her, this means that she will hear good news very soon. As for the one who sees in her dream someone dying before her eyes, this is a sign of the dreamer’s long life. Hearing the news of the death of a living married man. A married woman who dreams of hearing the news of the death of someone she knows in In reality, it is an indication that she is hiding a big secret that she does not want to reveal. As for her who dreams of someone she knows dying in a dream in front of her, this is a sign of the renewal of that person’s life and the longevity of her life. However, if she sees that she heard the news of the death of one of her relatives, this indicates great love in her. Her heart is for this person and she always thinks about him and his affairs. And if she dreams of the death of a stranger in her dream, this indicates the end of the obstacles she is going through. Hearing the news of the death of a living person in a divorced woman’s dream. A divorced woman who dreams of hearing the news of the death of a living person in her dream announces internal psychological suffering that lives on and causes her pain. It refers to the unstable life she lives after divorce and her suffering from society’s view of her. If the news of the death of a living person is a man I already know, then this is a sign of his longevity and health. Hearing the news of the death of a pregnant woman live. A pregnant woman who dreams of being in the presence of someone she does not know, and she has heard The news of his death during her sleep, her skin is good. An easy birth. It also indicates her recovery from the pain of the months of pregnancy that she is going through. The vision heralds the birth of a healthy man. Whoever sees that he heard the news of the death of someone he knew well, it is a sign of extensive breastfeeding for the newborn. Add the dream that You would like to explain it with reference to your marital status in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about drowning in the sea for someone else

preview.html: Seeing a person drowning in the sea in a dream is one of the visions that causes anxiety and confusion, which makes the viewer constantly search for an explanation for this vision to know what good or evil it brings, and this will be clarified through the following article, so stay with us. Interpretation of the dream of drowning in the sea and staying in the event In a dream, I saw a person drowning in the sea. This may be a sign that the dreamer has fallen into sin and disobedience, so he hastens to repent and seek forgiveness. When someone sees in a dream that he dreams of drowning. It could mean that seeing a person repents of sin. When a person sees in a dream that a person Another person he knows is drowning in the sea, the dreamer brings a means to save the drowning person. It could mean that the fortuneteller will help this person overcome a problem. If one sees in a dream one of his children drowning in the sea, then he is trying to save him from drowning. This is an indication that he is helping the viewer to Getting out of trouble. And if one sees in a dream that he is drowning, but because of his strength and health, the waves are not exhausting. It may mean that he will obtain a high position. When one sees in a dream that he is drowning in a clear and clean sea where he sees its bottom. In that is good news. About the abundance of sustenance that our Lord receives from abundant wealth. When a person sees in his dream that he is drowning in the sea, he will survive and actually get sick. This good news from God may include recovery from this disease, God willing. In the event that he sees a woman drowning in the sea during her sleep This may mean that she is immersed in worldly pleasures and the corruption of her actions, so she should take the initiative to ask for forgiveness. If a single woman dreams of saving herself from drowning in her dream, she will fail in a romantic relationship and enter into it in the near future, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about drowning in the sea for another person, according to Ibn Sirini. Ibn Sirini explains Sirin says in his interpretation that if someone sees in a dream that he is drowning in the sea for another person in clear water. This is an indication that the drowning person is enjoying bliss and prosperity in this world. Ibn Sirin states in his interpretations that if he sees in a dream that a person is drowning in the sea and gets sick. This may It indicates good tidings of some healing, and God knows best. And if he sees in his dream that a non-believer is drowning in the sea, then this is good news that this person will repent and enter Islam. Ibn Sirin says that if a person sees himself in a dream, he is drowning and this person is already dead. And this It may mean the bad condition of that dead person in the afterlife, and this vision shows the dreamer that he should ask forgiveness for that dead person. We chose for you: Interpretation of the dream of drowning in the sea and emerging from it. Interpretation of the dream of drowning in the sea and death. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that there is a person drowning in a dream and dying. This is an indication of the continuation of her romantic relationship with a young man of bad morals and religion, and it also shows that she knows very well that he is not fit to be her husband. What if a single woman saw in her dream that someone was drowning in the sea and died? This is a sign of her unhappiness in her next life because she cannot make a positive decision. Regarding the bad state of her relationship. When a married woman sees in her dream the death of a person drowning in the sea. This may indicate the difficulty of her life with her husband due to the increasing differences between him.

title: Learn about the interpretation of black ants in a dream from Ibn Sirin and Al-Usaimi, the interpretation of seeing small black ants in a dream, and the interpretation of a dream of black ants on the body.

preview.html: A black ant bite, black ants walking on the body, killing black ants in a dream, all of these dreams carry a wide range of connotations and interpretations, including good and evil, knowing that the interpretation is not uniform because it is different for single women than for married men. For divorced women, today we will return to the most important interpretations of seeing black ants in a dream. Black ants in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about black ants is an innocent vision because it symbolizes that the dreamer will be exposed to serious harm, as Al-Nabulsi indicated that the dreamer will be exposed to a serious health problem that will be the cause of the death of many children. As for those who He dreams that black ants are walking carefully on his head, then this is evidence that he is occupying his thoughts with trivial things and wasting his time on worthless things, and he must withdraw from that and know very well the value of time. As for the one who dreams that he is removing black ants from his body, this is evidence that he will be able to Overcoming all the difficulties of his life and he will be able to achieve everything he has aspired to for years. Black ants in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said that seeing ants in general symbolizes achieving many financial gains in the coming period, but in the case of seeing black winged ants, this indicates However, the dreamer is short and neglectful in some aspects of his life. Their future will be bright. Black ants in a dream symbolize the emergence of an emergency situation for the dreamer in the coming days. As for the quality of this occasion, it depends on the dreamer's life circumstances. As for someone who sees in his dream that black ants are carrying food heading to their burrow, this is an indication that many radical changes will occur in the dreamer’s life, and the dream also symbolizes that he is making a great effort to earn a living. Black ants in a dream by Al-Osaimi. Fahd Al-Osaimi said that seeing black ants on Clothes are an indication that the dreamer feels angry about his life, he is dissatisfied with the situation he has reached and is always looking for other people's possessions. The place of those close to him, so it is important for him to fortify himself with the verses of the Holy Qur’an and the Sharia ruqyah, and if he sees ants walking on the patient’s body, this is a sign that the time of his death has come. It is approaching, and God knows best. To get the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search on Google, the dream interpretation website on the Internet, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. Black ants in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about black ants for a single woman, indicates that she is surrounded by inappropriate people who always push her to Committing actions that arouse the wrath of God Almighty, so it is best to stay away from them. Seeing black ants in anyone’s dream is evidence that he is wasting his money on meaningless things, so expect to be exposed to a financial crisis soon. If black ants appear on the clothes of unmarried women, this is an indication that they enjoy a high degree of sophistication and elegance, as They care a lot about their appearance. Seeing black ants walking in the direction of the dreamer is a sign that he is surrounded by a large number of hateful and envious people, but they are weaker than others.

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing whales in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, and what does it indicate?

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing whales in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen. Seeing whales in a dream indicates important things that happen in the dreamer’s life that change the course of his life and can indicate fear, sadness, and anxiety about a great event and fear for the future. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a whale in a dream. The whale is considered a marine mammal and is considered One of the most famous marine creatures that live in the seas and oceans. It is characterized by a massive and long body. In a dream, it has many connotations and meanings, such as the color of the black whale, the white whale, the blue whale, the small whale, the big whale, or seeing the whale in the house, as well as the details of the dream and the type of scenes, which will be clear and detailed because many people wonder what is the interpretation of the whale in A dream. Seeing a whale in a dream is one of the visions that some people repeat, as it has more than one interpretation, and we will learn about it in the following lines of the article through my opinion, where the interpretation of whaling is swallowing and feeding the whale, and other matters mentioned in the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi. Interpretation Ibn Sirin’s dream of a whale: Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a whale in a dream as indicating a place of worship for the righteous. A whale in a dream symbolizes fears and sorrows, and indicates problems in the field of work. Also, seeing a whale in water is evidence of losing the dreamer’s problems and fears. In general, it is considered Seeing a whale in a dream is a sign of a major event that will happen after a while. Seeing whales in a dream indicates evil that will happen to the dreamer. A mother who sees a whale in her dream shows feelings of motherhood and a strong desire to protect her children. The dream of riding whales and controlling them in a dream is evidence that the dreamer He will have a prominent position in society, power and authority. Dreaming about hunting large whales is a sign of great financial gains. Interpretation of a whale in a dream sleeping in the dreamer’s bed is evidence that he is exposed to something that causes him sadness and anxiety. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a penguin in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a whale By Ibn Shaheen: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a whale in a dream is evidence that he is exposed to something difficult from which the dreamer will suffer a lot in the coming days. Dreaming about the presence of a large number of whales in a dream is a sign of anxiety about many things, constant thinking and constant unhappiness. Seeing a person in the belly of a black whale In a dream, it is a sign of God’s satisfaction with that person and acceptance of his prayers and supplications to the Lord. The dream interpretation of a whale interprets the dream as evidence that the dreamer has been hurt due to his negative treatment in dealing with different things in his life. See also: Dream interpretation of seeing a shark in a dream Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq’s interpretation of the dream of seeing a whale on the authority of Al-Nabulsi: Al-Nabulsi explained the vision of the whale, where he said: If the dreamer sleeps on his right side and sees the whale, then the vision indicates that the dreamer is among the righteous. Seeing the death of a whale in a dream is evidence that there will be good news The dreamer will hear it soon. He also said that seeing a whale in a dream indicates anxiety, sadness, death of situations, and anger. Seeing the whale of the Prophet Yunus (may God bless him and grant him peace) in a dream means...

title: Interpretation of a dream about cooking rice

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFans It is known that dreams are a special world dominated by ambiguity and secrets, and interpretations abound, and as is the case with any vision, the interpretation of seeing cooked rice in a dream varies according to the dreamer of this vision, whether he is single or married. . Or pregnant. Interpretation of a vision about cooking rice. Cooked rice in a dream has many good connotations. It can herald a happy family life and a successful career. Basically, the appearance of rice in a dream is a sign of good health and longevity, and pure white rice is an indicator of the formation of strong friendships and useful relationships. Cooking rice can indicate that there is a person in your life who needs your attention and care, and also indicates profit and success in something What. Eating cooked rice in a dream indicates progress, prosperity and good health for the dreamer. As for the bad omens of seeing cooked rice in a dream, it has been said that the vision is not good if milk is added to the rice, and the same is true if he sees a rice plant infested with insects, this indicates failure. . And despair.Interpretation of seeing cooked rice in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is eating cooked rice, this conveys to her the happy news of marriage, especially if it is cooked with cooked meat and rice for the unmarried girl, as this is a sign of the happy news of her marriage. Food, I swear. He knows best. Interpretation of a dream about cooking rice for a married woman. When a married woman dreams that she is cooking rice, this indicates the abundance of sustenance from God Almighty. But if a married woman sees cooked rice as if she were at a feast, and the rice was shared, this is evidence of the satisfaction of desires, and God is Most High. Al-Ali.Interpretation of a vision of a pregnant woman cooking rice. Cooked rice in a dream means that a pregnant woman is a good sign. If a pregnant woman sees herself cooking rice in her dream, this indicates goodness and abundance of food, and it also foretells her birth and safety, God willing. But if a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is eating cooked rice, this indicates the disappearance of anxiety and pain. Interpretation of seeing cooked rice in a man’s dream. Cooked rice in a dream means goodness. If the dreamer is male, this indicates lawful money or living in abundance. Sometimes this vision is an announcement of an upcoming marriage, if he is single, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. But if he is married and sees in his dream that he is eating cooked rice that his wife gave him, then this indicates the good and close relationship between husband and wife.
